text: Aur jo mohajreen aur ansaar sabiq aur muqaddam hain aur jitney log ikhlaas kay sath unn kay pairo hain Allah unn sab say razi hua aur woh sab uss say razi huye aur Allah ney unn kay liye aisay baagh mohiyya ker rakhay hain jin kay neechay nehren jaari hongi jin mein hamesha rahen gay yeh bari kaamyabi hai
